name: Prodoc AI
description: Prodoc AI's Patient Engagement Platform empowers healthcare providers to connect with patients on familiar platforms like WhatsApp. It guides them from pre-treatment discovery and appointment booking to treatment with reminders, information, and personalised service recommendations, ensuring a seamless healthcare experience.
focus_areas: Helps healthcare providers use conversational AI to direct patients to the right department, specialty, and doctor.
Prodoc AI enhances campaigns, lead engagement, nurturing, and sales conversions for Healthcare providers with effective care engagement.
Prodoc AI enables patient journeys, partner management, appointment scheduling, and referrals all via WhatsApp AI Conversations.
